title: Definition of CRYSTAL
description: quartz that is transparent or nearly so and that is either colorless or only slightly tinged; something resembling crystal in transparency and colorlessness... See the full definition
cleaned_text: 1 : quartz that is transparent or nearly so and that is either colorless or only slightly tinged 2 : something resembling crystal in transparency and colorlessness 3 : a body that is formed by the solidification of a chemical element, a compound, or a mixture and has a regularly repeating internal arrangement of its atoms and often external plane faces 4 : a clear colorless glass of superior quality also : objects or ware of such glass 5 : the glass or transparent plastic cover over a watch or clock dial 6 : a [crystalline](/dictionary/crystalline)material used in electronics as a frequency-determining element or for rectification 7 Example Sentences Noun the crystal structure of minerals a necklace made of crystal Some of the crystals used in the necklace are a pale pink color. The wine glasses are made of the finest crystal. She inherited her mother's crystal.
